sentences.sContent: The tumor will soon be resolved.
sentences.sCn: 这个肿瘤很快就会消掉的。

sentences.sContent: He literally pulled those cells out of their blood and grew billions more of them in laboratory dishes, enough to have a chance at overwhelming a tumor.
sentences.sCn: 他精确地把那些细胞从他们的血液中抽离出来，在实验室的培养皿中让其增值数十亿倍，大到足以有可能制服一个肿瘤。

phrases.pCn: 卵黄囊瘤；卵巢内胚层窦瘤

trans.tranOther: a mass of diseased cells in your body that have divided and increased too quickly
